Package neqsim.process.equipment.capacity

Enum Class StandardConstraintType

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<StandardConstraintType>
neqsim.process.equipment.capacity.StandardConstraintType
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<StandardConstraintType>, Constable
public enum StandardConstraintType extends Enum<StandardConstraintType>
Standard constraint types commonly used across process equipment.

This enum provides predefined constraint definitions with standard names and units. Use these constants when creating CapacityConstraint objects for common constraint types to ensure consistency across the codebase.

Example usage: 

 CapacityConstraint speedConstraint = StandardConstraintType.COMPRESSOR_SPEED.createConstraint()
     .setDesignValue(10000.0).setMaxValue(11000.0).setValueSupplier(() -> compressor.getSpeed());
Version:
1.0
Author:
NeqSim Development Team

  • Enum Constant Details

    • SEPARATOR_GAS_LOAD_FACTOR

      public static final StandardConstraintType SEPARATOR_GAS_LOAD_FACTOR
      Gas load factor (K-factor) for separators. Represents the ratio of actual gas velocity to design terminal velocity.

    • SEPARATOR_K_VALUE

      public static final StandardConstraintType SEPARATOR_K_VALUE
      K-value (Souders-Brown factor) at HLL for separators. Per Equinor TR3500 SR-50535: K-value must be less than 0.15 m/s.

    • SEPARATOR_DROPLET_CUTSIZE

      public static final StandardConstraintType SEPARATOR_DROPLET_CUTSIZE
      Droplet cut size in gas section above liquid level. Per Equinor TR3500 SR-50535: Must be less than 150 Âµm.

    • SEPARATOR_INLET_MOMENTUM

      public static final StandardConstraintType SEPARATOR_INLET_MOMENTUM
      Inlet nozzle momentum flux. Per Equinor Revamp Limit: Must be less than 16000 Pa.

    • SEPARATOR_OIL_RETENTION_TIME

      public static final StandardConstraintType SEPARATOR_OIL_RETENTION_TIME
      Oil retention time between NIL and NLL. Per API 12J: Minimum 3-5 minutes for light oils.

    • SEPARATOR_WATER_RETENTION_TIME

      public static final StandardConstraintType SEPARATOR_WATER_RETENTION_TIME
      Water retention time below NIL. Per API 12J: Minimum 3-5 minutes.

    • SEPARATOR_LIQUID_LOAD_FACTOR

      public static final StandardConstraintType SEPARATOR_LIQUID_LOAD_FACTOR
      Liquid load factor for separators. Represents liquid throughput relative to design capacity.

    • SEPARATOR_RESIDENCE_TIME

      public static final StandardConstraintType SEPARATOR_RESIDENCE_TIME
      Liquid residence time in separators. Minimum time required for phase separation.

    • COMPRESSOR_SPEED

      public static final StandardConstraintType COMPRESSOR_SPEED
      Compressor rotational speed (max). Limited by mechanical design or curve maximum.

    • COMPRESSOR_MIN_SPEED

      public static final StandardConstraintType COMPRESSOR_MIN_SPEED
      Compressor minimum speed. Limited by curve minimum or stability requirements.

    • COMPRESSOR_POWER

      public static final StandardConstraintType COMPRESSOR_POWER
      Compressor shaft power.

    • COMPRESSOR_SURGE_MARGIN

      public static final StandardConstraintType COMPRESSOR_SURGE_MARGIN
      Compressor surge margin. Distance from surge line as percentage of flow.

    • COMPRESSOR_STONEWALL_MARGIN

      public static final StandardConstraintType COMPRESSOR_STONEWALL_MARGIN
      Compressor stonewall margin. Distance from stonewall as percentage of flow.

    • COMPRESSOR_DISCHARGE_TEMP

      public static final StandardConstraintType COMPRESSOR_DISCHARGE_TEMP
      Compressor discharge temperature.

    • PUMP_NPSH_MARGIN

      public static final StandardConstraintType PUMP_NPSH_MARGIN
      Pump NPSH margin. Available NPSH minus required NPSH.

    • PUMP_FLOW_RATE

      public static final StandardConstraintType PUMP_FLOW_RATE
      Pump flow rate capacity.

    • PUMP_POWER

      public static final StandardConstraintType PUMP_POWER
      Pump power consumption.

    • HEAT_EXCHANGER_DUTY

      public static final StandardConstraintType HEAT_EXCHANGER_DUTY
      Heat exchanger duty.

    • HEAT_EXCHANGER_APPROACH_TEMP

      public static final StandardConstraintType HEAT_EXCHANGER_APPROACH_TEMP
      Heat exchanger approach temperature. Minimum temperature difference between streams.

    • HEAT_EXCHANGER_PRESSURE_DROP

      public static final StandardConstraintType HEAT_EXCHANGER_PRESSURE_DROP
      Heat exchanger pressure drop.

    • VALVE_CV_UTILIZATION

      public static final StandardConstraintType VALVE_CV_UTILIZATION
      Valve Cv utilization. Ratio of required Cv to installed Cv.

    • VALVE_PRESSURE_DROP

      public static final StandardConstraintType VALVE_PRESSURE_DROP
      Valve pressure drop.

    • VALVE_OPENING

      public static final StandardConstraintType VALVE_OPENING
      Valve opening position.

    • PIPE_VELOCITY

      public static final StandardConstraintType PIPE_VELOCITY
      Pipe fluid velocity.

    • PIPE_EROSIONAL_VELOCITY

      public static final StandardConstraintType PIPE_EROSIONAL_VELOCITY
      Pipe erosional velocity ratio. Ratio of actual to erosional velocity.

    • PIPE_PRESSURE_DROP

      public static final StandardConstraintType PIPE_PRESSURE_DROP
      Pipe pressure drop per unit length.

    • createConstraint

      public CapacityConstraint createConstraint()
      Creates a new CapacityConstraint with this type's predefined settings.

      The returned constraint has the name, unit, type, and description preset. You still need to set the design value, max value, and value supplier.

      Returns:
      a new CapacityConstraint with this type's settings
